What is a fast way to fold your clothes ?

One fast way to fold your clothes is by using the "KonMari" folding method, which involves folding clothes in a way that they can stand upright on their own. This method minimizes wrinkles and makes it easy to organize and store clothes efficiently.
what about just hanging them on hangers ?

Hanging clothes on hangers is indeed a fast method to keep them organized and wrinkle-free. It works well for items like shirts, dresses, blouses, and pants that are more prone to wrinkling. Hanging clothes can also save space in your closet and make it easier to select and access your outfits.
Should I iron them before or is there another method ?

Ironing clothes before hanging or folding them can help remove wrinkles and make them look crisp and presentable. However, if you're looking for an alternative method, you can try using a fabric steamer or a wrinkle releasing spray. These options can help eliminate wrinkles without the need for ironing. Remember to follow the instructions provided with the steamer or spray for best results.
